about_the_game:
The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault is a passion project made by Tyee 'Lar Oxenbury. He has gathered talent from all over the world to come together and make this game.

The soundtrack itself is made by a single artist, Joshua Cotter, from the U.K, where he made every track himself, ranging from many examples given to him.

Officially owning this DLC, directly from Steam, grants the user to freely use the included tracks as they see fit. However, please read the EULA for more detailed information in utilising these audio tracks.
